title: Moody

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Throw a tantrum every night.
-Drink your cup of tea.
-Refill your cup of tea.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Throwing a tantrum grants you Invincible Defense and deals an Astral Basic Attack to all of your visitors.
-Drinking your cup of tea lowers your defense value to None and invalidates all protection for tonight.
-You cannot drink your cup of tea more than once per game.
-Refilling your cup of tea gives you 1 charge of drinking your cup of tea. Every player visiting you will know you are the Moody if you refill your cup.
-If you go 2 nights in a row without throwing a tantrum, you will deal yourself an Unstoppable Attack at the end of the 3rd night.
-Once you die, deal an Unstoppable Attack to your killer. If there are multiple, only one, chosen at random, will be dealt an Unstoppable Attack.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Die at night by a role other than yourself.

desc:
Post 269
*I dont need sleep! I NEED TEA!!*
Roleblock Immunity
